air:OptionalService.air:Text: Staying connected whilst in the air

WiFi is available on board many Air Canada aircraft. Roll out as at 12 October 2020 is:
- Boeing 777-300ER 19 out of 19 aircraft. - Boeing 777-200LR 6 out of 6 aircraft. - Airbus A330-300 5 out of 17 aircraft. - Boeing 787-9 29 out of 29 aircraft. - Boeing 787-8 7 out of 8 aircraft. - Boeing 767-300 ER 25 out of 25 aircraft.
(taken from Air Canada website)
